title: How to Blow-dry Hair | AXE | Instagroom
description:
Most guys don’t blow-dry their hair, but Didyer has his smooth method that shows you how to get the most out of a blowout.

THE TOOLS:
AXE Urban Messy Look Flexible Paste

THE STEPS:
1. Towel dry
2. Warm paste on hands
3. Put hairdryer on medium heat
4. Brush from front to back give hair volume

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.
